message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you a decent amount to keep you interested.
You're being too generous, Alice. I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small consolation prize.
You're taking a bigger share, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal.
You're getting closer, Alice, but I still think I deserve more. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off easy.
